name: @bremmdev/m7base
description: A CSS library that gives websites a quick styling with modern CSS resets, base styles and optional component class styles.

scripts.build: lightningcss --bundle --minify --targets "defaults, not IE 11" styles/index.css --output-dir dist && mv dist/index.css dist/m7base.css && cp dist/m7base.css docs/src/m7base.css && cp dist/m7base.css docs/src/m7base.css
